name: Otis
text:
Otis
Otis was an associate of Dale Cooper's doppelganger.
Biography
Otis lived in a cabin with a disabled man in a wheelchair, a thin man, Buella, Ray and Darya. The cabin was guarded by a trucker with a shotgun.
The doppelganger - whom Otis called "Mr. C" - visited Otis when he retrieved Ray and Darya from Buella.
